channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 30 Best Horror Movies on Netflix, Max, and Beyond (2024)
item.description: From imported gore to found footage frights, these movies are sure to get you into the spirit of the season.

item.title: FTC hits Lyft with $2.1M penalty for luring drivers with false earnings claims
item.description: Lyft has agreed to a $2.1 million settlement proposed by the FTC over the car-hailing company’s “deceptive earnings claims about how much money driver...

item.title: How to Give Neurotic Losers the Main Character Treatment
item.description: Tony Tulathimutte, author of Rejection, peers into the soul of millennial disorder in the way that no one else does.

item.title: A Neuralink Rival Says Its Eye Implant Restored Vision in Blind People
item.description: Science Corporation's retinal implant allowed some people who lost their central vision to read, play cards, and recognize faces.

item.title: What is Apple Intelligence, when is it coming and who will get it?
item.description: Apple Intelligence was designed to leverage things that generative AI already does well, like text and image generation, to improve upon existing feat...

item.title: McDonald’s broken ice cream machines could get fixed faster thanks to new federal rule
item.description: McDonald’s ice cream machines have developed a lousy reputation for being broken when you visit the restaurant, largely due to strict copyright laws t...

item.title: ‘Yikes’: While gaming, Musk inadvertently broadcasts ‘scary’ near-abort of Starship booster landing
item.description: Elon Musk occasionally posts clips of his video game plays to his social media platform X — but a recent clip includes background audio of a SpaceX en...

item.title: NAACP launches $200 million fund of funds
item.description: The NAACP announced today NAACP Capital, a $200 million fund of funds to back fund managers focused on issues that impact people of color. The fund wa...

item.title: OceanGate Faces Federal Investigation a Year After the Titan Submersible Implosion
item.description: A US Attorney's office is investigating the company behind the doomed expedition to the wreck of the Titanic, sources tell WIRED, even as a civil suit...
